amendment.description: An amendment numbered 106 printed in House Report 115-297 to strike language that currently prevents funds from being used to process applications for relief from personal firearms disabilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A107) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A107) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A107) offered by Mr. Grothman.
